overview: Taking revenge for being cheated is sweetest when it is done in collaboration with someone who is really close to that nasty motherfucker, and that's waht the dirty bitches in this compilation exactly know. May it be a best friend, a stranger or a close relative, who the fuck cares? The only thing that counts is to get their long forgotten snatch pounded as hard as it used to be by that nasty motherfucker.
title: Taking Sensual Revenge
